attributes.action: Hold an E.U Referendum in 2016 instead of 2017
attributes.additional_details: The issue of Britain's membership to the E.U has been going on way to long lets get it settled once and for all let the British people make their decision in 2016
attributes.background: Economic migration is out of control, We pay way to much money to Europe along with all the other chaos in Europe. British people Deserve the E.U Referendum in 2016 at the latest instead of 2017.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104838

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
